definitions.definition: Disruptive change, from one state to another.
The process of being heaved upward , especially the raising of part of the earth 's crust .
A sudden violent upset , disruption or convulsion .

main_definition: Disruptive change, from one state to another.
secondary_definitions: The process of being heaved upward , especially the raising of part of the earth 's crust .
A sudden violent upset , disruption or convulsion .
